PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-09602024-08-28IRCC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of DEREK RICHARD VERMETTE of Calgary, Alberta, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Calgary Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective September 15, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
